00027 #ifndef __TEXTURE_H__
00028 #define __TEXTURE_H__
00029 
00030 #include "osystem.h"
00031 #include "omega/GpuManager.h"
00032 
00033 namespace omega
00034 {
00036         class OMEGA_API Texture
00037         {
00038         public:
00039                 Texture(): 
00040                   myInitialized(false), 
00041                   myDirty(true),
00042                   myData(NULL),
00043                   myTextureUnit(GpuManager::TextureUnitInvalid) {}
00044 
00045                 void initialize(byte* data, int width, int height); 
00046 
00047                 bool isDirty() { return myDirty; }
00048                 void setDirty() { myDirty = true; }
00049 
00050                 //byte* getData() { return myData; }
00051 
00052                 int getWidth();
00053                 int getHeight();
00054 
00056 
00057                         GLuint getGLTexture();
00058                         void bind(GpuManager::TextureUnit unit);
00059                         void unbind();
00060                         void refresh();
00061                         bool isBound();
00062                         GpuManager::TextureUnit getTextureUnit();
00063 
00065 
00066         private:
00067                 bool myInitialized;
00068                 bool myDirty;
00069                 GLuint myId;
00070                 GLubyte* myData;
00071                 int myWidth;
00072                 int myHeight;
00073 
00074                 GpuManager::TextureUnit myTextureUnit;
00075         };
00076 
00078         inline int Texture::getWidth() 
00079         { return myWidth; }
00080 
00082         inline int Texture::getHeight() 
00083         { return myHeight; }
00084 
00086         inline GLuint Texture::getGLTexture() 
00087         {
00088                 oassert(myInitialized);
00089                 return myId; 
00090         }
00091 
00093         inline bool Texture::isBound()
00094         {
00095                 return (myTextureUnit != GpuManager::TextureUnitInvalid ? true : false);
00096         }
00097 
00099         inline GpuManager::TextureUnit Texture::getTextureUnit()
00100         { return myTextureUnit; }
00101 }; // namespace omega
